content: *it s mash up time * the cowldana neckwarmer is a mix between a cowl and a bandana it is intended to be a beginner friendly knitting pattern yet at the same time being a functional standalone piece of modern knitwear the cowldana can be enjoyed by even the most skilled of knitters its a quick fun project and makes for the most amazing gift or even market prep why not try out the pattern using up all that left over yarn from other projects a user friendly blank chart has been included in the pattern to help you create and visualize any colour combination your heart desires required materials * 1 skein of malabrigo mecha yarn 100g 119m/ 130yds or any similar weight per meter yarn * 8mm / us 11 knitting needles * stitch marker * scissors * darning needle
